alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 25 at 2:14PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR ALL OF THE OKLAHOMA AND TEXAS PANHANDLES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb... Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Oldham... Potter...Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Deaf Smith...Randall... Armstrong...Donley...Collingsworth and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest winds of 20 to 35 mph with higher gusts are anticipated. * Relative Humidity...Minimum relative humidity values between 15 and 25 percent are expected. * Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 4. * Timing...Critical fire weather conditions are forecast to begin around Noon Sunday and end by around 6 PM Sunday.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
